name: Dagger of heroes
description:
Dagger of heroes - Are you able to resist the forces of evil? That captured the peaceful outskirts and destroy their inhabitants. Try your luck and find out what awaits you on the battlefield? Or will you put up with it and take it for granted?

The game is a 2D platformer with roguelike and RPG elements. Choose the appropriate class and go to the locations that you need to clear. And also you have to face dangerous bosses that will not let you pass.

Choose one of several characters and go on a journey through the occupied lands. Test yourself on the battlefield. Arm yourself with powerful weapons and dress up in the best armor and fight back against your enemies!

Use strategy, ingenuity, and the advantage of a particular class to get the upper hand on your enemies!
